FlavorText: A stained scroll written by an Orbei monk.
Name: Blood-Splattered Scroll
NoticeSignText: In my dreams, a figure bathed in Light, named Izzoth, came and spoke words of great power. I have written them down and placed the scroll at Khotunâ€™s Reach where only the faithful will find it. Seek the first trail marker at the graveyard of ships.
